casebody.data:
Allen Lamont JAMES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 17, 2017

April E. Brodeur, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Allen Lamont James' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn.App. 800, 156 A.3d 89 (2017), is denied.
